DOC.brief_title: A Longitudinal Observational Cohort Study NSI-189 , With Out-Patients With Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: Following completion NS2014-1 final study visit procedure , Subjects offer opportunity enroll longitudinal observational cohort protocol monitor depression ass durability effect long-term safety NSI-189 . The Enrollment Visit begin informed consent signed.The duration follow-up period 6 month , start new antidepressant treatment . Subjects provide consent see in-person visit every 8 week , bi-monthly phone visit occur in-person visit . Safety assessment efficacy assessment perform visit . No study drug take Longitudinal Observational Cohort study .
